column4: Hi all, I am trying to mount my main harddrive using ubuntu 8.10 live dvd thru the File Browswer and it's not mounting. What is going wrong?
how is that? Does it give an error? Have you tried mounting from the command line?
type "sudo fdisk -l" to list your disks, then you can use a command such as "sudo mount /dev/sda1 /some/point"
I told you to do this is a terminal "sudo fdisk -l"
